title: Login button unresponsive on Safari - Checkout page
description: Users on Safari 17+ cannot click the login button on the checkout page. Button appears but doesn't register clicks. Works fine on Chrome and Firefox.

title: Payment processing timeout for amounts over $10,000
description: Stripe webhook times out when processing transactions above $10k. Results in successful charge but no order confirmation email. Affects approximately 2% of enterprise customers.

title: Dashboard export CSV missing header row
description: When exporting analytics dashboard to CSV, the header row is missing. Data rows are present but column names are not included. Started after last deploy.

title: SSO redirect loop for Google Workspace users
description: Google Workspace SSO users get stuck in an infinite redirect loop when trying to sign in. Clearing cookies fixes temporarily but issue returns. Okta SSO works fine.

title: XSS vulnerability in user profile bio field
description: Stored XSS possible through the user profile biography field. Script tags are not sanitized and execute when other users view the profile. Discovered during internal pen test.

title: Subscription renewal charge applied twice
description: Some monthly subscribers are being charged twice on their renewal date. Stripe dashboard shows duplicate charges. Approximately 50 users affected in the last billing cycle.

title: Mobile responsive layout broken on product listing page
description: Product cards overlap and text is cut off on screens smaller than 375px width. Images stretch beyond their containers. Affects iPhone SE and older Android devices.

title: API rate limiter rejecting valid requests under threshold
description: The API rate limiter is incorrectly counting requests and blocking users who haven't exceeded their quota. Logs show the counter resets inconsistently. Affects about 15% of API consumers.

title: Analytics dashboard loading time exceeds 30 seconds
description: The main analytics dashboard takes 30-45 seconds to load when date range is set to last 90 days. Query appears to do a full table scan. Smaller date ranges load normally.

title: CSRF token validation failing on checkout form submission
description: Checkout form submissions intermittently fail with CSRF token mismatch error. Appears to happen when users have multiple tabs open. Error rate is about 3% of submissions.

title: Password reset email contains expired token
description: Password reset tokens expire before the email arrives. Token TTL is set to 5 minutes but email delivery takes 8-10 minutes through our provider. Users unable to reset passwords.

title: Checkout page price shows $0.00 for subscription plans
description: After selecting a subscription plan, the checkout page displays $0.00 instead of the actual price. The correct amount is still charged. Likely a frontend rendering issue.

title: Data export job fails silently for reports over 100k rows
description: When exporting reports with more than 100,000 rows, the export job fails without any error message to the user. The job appears to hang indefinitely. Smaller exports work fine.

title: Refund processing stuck in pending state
description: Refunds initiated through the admin panel stay in 'pending' state indefinitely. Stripe shows the refund was processed successfully but our system doesn't update the status.

title: Screen reader cannot navigate dropdown menus
description: ARIA attributes missing on dropdown navigation menus. Screen readers skip over the dropdowns entirely. Fails WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for keyboard navigation.

title: SQL injection possible in search endpoint query parameter
description: The /api/v2/search endpoint does not properly sanitize the 'q' parameter. Union-based SQL injection confirmed during penetration testing. Can extract user table data.

title: Database connection pool exhaustion during peak hours
description: Between 2-4 PM UTC, the database connection pool reaches maximum capacity causing 503 errors. Pool size is 20 connections. Average query time increases from 50ms to 3s.

title: Stripe webhook events processed out of order
description: Payment intent events are sometimes processed before the customer creation event, causing orphaned payments. Race condition in the webhook handler queue.

title: Dashboard metrics show negative values for user count
description: The active users metric on the analytics dashboard occasionally shows negative numbers. Appears to be a calculation error when users are deleted mid-aggregation cycle.

title: Chrome autofill breaks form validation on signup page
description: When Chrome autofills the signup form, the client-side validation doesn't trigger. Users can submit forms with invalid email formats. Chrome 120+ on macOS and Windows.

title: API documentation examples return 404 errors
description: Several code examples in the API documentation reference endpoints that have been moved or renamed. Developers following the docs get 404 responses.

title: PII data visible in application error logs
description: User email addresses and phone numbers are being written to application error logs in plaintext. Discovered during log audit. Approximately 3 months of logs affected.

title: Billing invoice PDF generation fails for international currencies
description: PDF invoices show incorrect currency symbols and formatting for non-USD currencies. Japanese Yen shows decimal places, Euro symbol is missing. Affects all international customers.

title: Dark mode toggle does not persist across sessions
description: When users enable dark mode in settings, the preference is lost after closing the browser. The setting is stored in sessionStorage instead of localStorage.

title: Real-time analytics websocket disconnects every 5 minutes
description: The websocket connection for the real-time analytics dashboard drops every 5 minutes and requires a page refresh to reconnect. No automatic reconnection logic.

title: SSO session token not invalidated on logout
description: After logging out via SSO, the session token remains valid. Users can use the old token to access protected resources. Token should be revoked on the identity provider side.

title: Checkout coupon code field accepts expired coupons
description: The checkout page does not validate coupon expiration dates. Expired coupons are accepted and the discount is applied. No server-side validation either.

title: Performance regression in user search API after migration
description: The /api/users/search endpoint response time increased from 200ms to 2.5s after the database migration last week. Missing index on the new user_profiles table.

title: Report scheduler sends duplicate email notifications
description: Scheduled report emails are being sent twice. The cron job appears to run twice due to deployment across two server instances without proper locking.

title: Image upload on profile page fails for files over 5MB
description: Profile photo upload silently fails for images larger than 5MB. No error message is shown to the user. The upload spinner continues indefinitely. Need to add file size validation.

title: Stripe subscription cancellation does not stop recurring charges
description: When users cancel their subscription through our UI, the cancellation is not sent to Stripe. Users continue to be charged in the next billing cycle. Critical revenue impact.

title: API response missing CORS headers for partner domain
description: The new partner integration domain partner.example.com is not in the CORS allowlist. API calls from their frontend are blocked by the browser. Need to add to the config.

title: Data pipeline ETL job skips records with null timestamps
description: The nightly ETL job silently drops records where the created_at field is null. Approximately 2% of records are affected. Data warehouse is missing these entries.

title: Cross-site request forgery on account settings page
description: The account settings update endpoint does not verify CSRF tokens. An attacker can change user email and notification preferences through a forged request.

title: Mobile app crashes on Android 12 when opening notifications
description: The Android app crashes immediately when tapping on a push notification on Android 12 devices. Stack trace shows NullPointerException in NotificationHandler. iOS is unaffected.

title: Payment receipt shows wrong tax calculation for Canadian provinces
description: HST/GST/PST calculations are incorrect for Canadian provinces. Ontario shows 5% instead of 13% HST. Affects all Canadian customer receipts.

title: Login page CSS loads after content causing flash of unstyled text
description: The login page shows a brief flash of unstyled content (FOUC) for about 500ms on initial load. CSS stylesheet is loaded asynchronously instead of in the head.

title: Infrastructure monitoring alerts firing for healthy instances
description: CloudWatch alarms are triggering false positive alerts for EC2 instances that show healthy in the health check dashboard. Alert threshold configuration may be too sensitive.

title: User encryption keys stored in plaintext in database
description: API encryption keys for user integrations are stored as plaintext strings in the integrations table. Should be encrypted at rest using KMS. Found during security review.

title: Dashboard pie chart colors not distinguishable for colorblind users
description: The analytics dashboard pie chart uses red and green colors that are indistinguishable for users with red-green color blindness. Need to use a colorblind-safe palette.

title: Bulk data import API endpoint has no file size limit
description: The /api/import/bulk endpoint accepts arbitrarily large files with no size limit. A 10GB upload was observed causing the server to run out of memory and crash.

title: Checkout flow breaks when browser back button is pressed
description: Pressing the browser back button during checkout step 3 of 4 causes the cart to empty and payment information to be lost. Users must restart the entire checkout process.

title: Metrics aggregation cron job has memory leak
description: The hourly metrics aggregation cron job consumes increasing amounts of memory with each run. After 24 hours, it uses 8GB+ RAM and gets OOM killed. Restarting the worker fixes it temporarily.

title: Refund webhook handler does not retry on failure
description: If the Stripe refund webhook handler fails (e.g., database timeout), the event is dropped and never retried. Need to implement a dead letter queue for failed webhook events.

title: Safari users see login button that does nothing on checkout page
description: On Safari browsers, the checkout page login button is visible but completely non-functional. Clicking it does nothing. Possibly related to event handler attachment timing.

title: Large Stripe transactions over 10000 dollars timing out
description: High-value Stripe payments exceeding $10,000 are timing out during processing. The charge goes through on Stripe's end but our system shows the transaction as failed.

title: CSV export from analytics dashboard has no column headers
description: Downloading CSV reports from the analytics section produces files without the header row. Column names are missing so users can't identify what each column represents.

title: Google SSO authentication entering infinite redirect cycle
description: Users authenticating via Google SSO encounter an infinite redirect between our callback URL and Google's auth server. Session cookies appear to not be set correctly.

title: Stored XSS in user bio allows JavaScript execution
description: The user profile biography field does not sanitize HTML input. Malicious users can inject script tags that execute when anyone views the profile page.

title: Feature request: Add keyboard shortcuts for dashboard navigation
description: Users have requested keyboard shortcuts to navigate between dashboard sections without using the mouse. Common shortcuts like Ctrl+1 through Ctrl+5 for main sections.
